texts.EmailActivation_SubTitle: Your account is almost ready. One more step is activating your account.
texts.EmailActivation_ClickTheLinkBelowToVerif: To activate your account, please click the link below:
texts.EmailMessage_CopyTheLinkBelowToYourBrows: If the above link does not work, please copy and paste the link into your browser:
texts.EmailConfirmation_SubTitle: Your email is the commuication channel between you and the service.
texts.EmailConfirmation_ClickTheLinkBelowToCon: To verify your email, please click the link below:
texts.FarewellDeletedUser_Body: We are sorry to see that you are gone.
texts.NewOrResetPassword_Body: To log into your account, please use the following password:
texts.NotyPasswordChange_Body: Your passowrd has changed. If you do not recognize this operation, your account may be compromized. Please take action right now.
texts.ResendActivationLink_Information: Please provide your account information as required below. Then the system will send you a new activation email to your registered email box.
texts.ResendActivationLink_Success: An account activation email has been sent to your e-mail address. If you don't see this email in your inbox within 15 minutes, look for it in your junk mail folder. If you find it there, please mark it as -Not Junk-.
texts.TwoFactorCode_Title: Here is your two factor code
texts.TwoFactorCode_Body: You requested a two factor code. Please copy and paste the following code to continue your login.
texts.TwoFactorCode_SentSuccess: The two factor code has been sent out. Please check ...
texts.NotyMemberRegistration_Title: New registration waiting for your approval
texts.NotyMemberRegistration_Body: {0} just registered for your organization and is waiting for your approval. Please follow the link between to approve this request.
texts.ApproveMemberRegistration_Title: New remember registered for your organization.
texts.ApproveMemberRegistration_Body: {0} just registered for your organization. There is no required action from you this moment.
